pr_title: Refactor DDLStatement to MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQL92, SQLServer DDLStatement

timeline.message: Refactor DDLStatement to MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, SQL92 and SQLServer DDLStatement
modify drop index statement getTable method

timeline.bodyText: I saw none of xxx DropFunctionStatement and this class has members, so what role does DropFunctionStatement play?
timeline.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText:
I saw none of xxx DropFunctionStatement and this class has members, so what role does DropFunctionStatement play?

@tristaZero DropFunctionStatement has two implementation classes——MySQLDropFunctionStatement and PostgreSQLDropFunctionStatement, and they have been included in PR.
replies.author: strongduanmu

replies.bodyText: Why do all of them have no members?  MySQLDropFunctionStatement and PostgreSQLDropFunctionStatement  will be filled with member variables later?
replies.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText:
Why do all of them have no members? MySQLDropFunctionStatement and PostgreSQLDropFunctionStatement  will be filled with member variables later?

@tristaZero Yes, they will be optimized in #6498. Later, the table name in the statement will be parsed and the table will be verified.
replies.author: strongduanmu
